MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: The CAT-CNB is a recently-developed version of the Penn Computerized Neurocognitive Battery that uses item-response theory and computerized adaptive testing (CAT) to shorten administration time while preserving precision

measured_emotion_differentiation_task_sa.Description: Final accuracy score from measured emotion differentiation task ('same' condition). Values are z-scored relative to a crowdsourced U.S. sample from ages 18-80.

measured_emotion_differentiation_task_di.Description: Final accuracy score from measured emotion differentiation task ('different' condition). Values are z-scored relative to a crowdsourced U.S. sample from ages 18-80.

penn_line_orientation_test.Description: Final accuracy score from penn line orientation test. Values are z-scored relative to a crowdsourced U.S. sample from ages 18-80.

penn_matrix_analysis_test.Description: Final accuracy score from penn matrix analysis test. Values are z-scored relative to a crowdsourced U.S. sample from ages 18-80.

delay_discounting_task.Description: Final accuracy score from delay discounting task. Values are z-scored relative to a crowdsourced U.S. sample from ages 18-80.

risk_discounting_task.Description: Final accuracy score from risk discounting task. Values are z-scored relative to a crowdsourced U.S. sample from ages 18-80.
